text: Peace for Lugansk Region is a political party in the Luhansk People's Republic. Its president is Leonid Pasechnik who is also current Head of the Luhansk People's Republic. The party wants an independent Luhansk that can have close ties with Russia. The party won the 2014 Luhansk general election with the 69.42% of the votes and 35 seats. ==References== ==External links== * Category:2014 establishments in Ukraine Category:2014 pro-Russian unrest in Ukraine Category:Banned political parties in Ukraine Category:Banned secessionist parties Category:Eurosceptic parties in Ukraine Category:Political parties established in 2014 Category:Political parties in the Luhansk People's Republic Category:Russian nationalism in Ukraine Category:Russian political parties in Ukraine Category:Secessionist organizations in Europe Category:Separatism in Ukraine
title: Peace for Lugansk Region
